name: mini-combobox
template: <input class="mini-combobox" action="get$cexpr$Model" id="$expr$" bind="dataBean.$expr$" textField="text" valueField="id" emptyText="请选择..." required="true" requiredErrorText="下拉列表不能为空!"/>

name: mini-radiobuttonlist
template:
<div class="mini-radiobuttonlist" action="get$cexpr$Model" id="$expr$"
 bind="dataBean.$expr$" required="true" requiredErrorText="不能为空!"/>

name: mini-checkboxlist
template:
<div class="mini-checkboxlist" action="get$cexpr$Model" id="$expr$"
  bind="dataBean.$expr$" required="true" requiredErrorText="不能为空!"/>

name: mini-checkbox
template:
<div class="mini-checkbox" id="$expr$" bind="dataBean.$expr$" required="true"
 requiredErrorText="不能为空!"/>

name: mini-textbox
mini-datepicker
template:
<input class="mini-datepicker" bind="dataBean.$expr$" id="$expr$" required="true"
    requiredErrorText="不能为空!"/>

name: mini-combobox_search
template: <input class="mini-combobox" action="get$cexpr$Model" id="search_$expr$" bind="dataBean.$expr$" textField="text" valueField="id" emptyText="请选择..."/>
